summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Ravenna Avenue, from East 62nd Street to East 63rd Street, by constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 9499, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", and repealing Ordinance No. 55704, approved July 17, 1928.
